DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability multiple oral daily dose BMS-708163 healthy young male subject
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese nonJapanese subject Japanese subject must first generation Japanese must demonstrate maternal paternal Japanese ancestry NonJapanese subject must Japanese Asian descent , ie , neither parent grandparent born Japan Asian country BMI 19 25 kg/m² , Japanese nonJapanese subject Men age 20 45 year Serum creatinine value normal range Urine protein blood level normal range Liver function test normal range TSH , free T3 , free T4 outside normal range Amylase lipase level normal range Positive Fecal Immunochemical Test ( FIT™ )
